name: 定時制の人妻JK - Married Girls' Night School
name_original: 定時制の人妻JK - Married Girls' Night School
description:
"定時制の人妻JK - Married Girls' Night School -" is a novel game that depicts takes place at a night school in which married girls who love young boys meet the protagonist.
A Bishojo Game released in 2018 under the "Incarose" brand has been reworked for the "PandaShojo" platform for players of all ages worldwide to enjoy.


◆Introduction
"Let's practice communicating by talking with your teacher"
Get back on your feet and rewrite your youth, these kind married girls are here to help you.
But the three people who are helping Yuki seem to have problems of their own.
―――Now it's my turn to return the favor...!


◆Synopsis
Yuki Asado is a "Hikikomori" who stays at home after being bullied.
One day, his neighbor Natsuki who is a teacher suggests he try going to night school.
"It might change your life"
Yuki who thought that this could not go on forever became excited at this new life.

He develops a good relation with his homeroom teacher Natsuki, and his classmates Akira and Sakura.
Yuki is finally able to get back on his feet because of their kindness.
However, he falls in love with them despite knowing that they are married.
How will his new life turn out surrounded by married girls...!


◆Characters
・Natsuki Kahara
"Do you want to give it a try? It might change your life"
Although she looks younger than her age, she is married and a mother of one.
She is a teacher at the night school and is responsible for Yuki's class.
Although Yuki adores her, he had given up after finding out she is married.
She cares about Yuki a lot, perhaps beyond the boundaries of a teacher...

・Akira Takizu
"You're always so cute. This might turn into love at first sight"
No matter how you look at her, she's a very young married girl that's around the same age.
One of Yuki's classmates, she is aggressively tries to approach him.
What could be the reason...

・Sakura Nimi
"Hehe, you're so cute when you're nervous"
An extremely young looking woman, but is actually the oldest and also a mother of two.
Another classmate who heard from Natsuki and Akira about how cute Yuki is and decided to approach him.
She gets closer by asking him to choose her nephew's birthday present together, but what is she really after...?

・Yuki Asado
A "Hikikomori" who stays at home after being bullied.
He starts attending night school after being convinced by Natsuki.
All he wanted was to go through his youth again, but...
